intro: Podosemum gymnostylum, commonly known as the smooth-leaved podosemum, is a species of flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes cotton and hibiscus, and is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers that are clustered in inflorescences, followed by capsule fruits containing numerous seeds. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for ecological and taxonomic studies in its native habitat.
